name: Nourishment
description:
Keep growing as deep as you can go. Make sure you stay connected to the flower and that your nourishment points don't drop to zero. Growing more root tiles costs nourishment, having a root near water restores nourishment as does moving through enemy corpses to eat them. You can kill enemies by dropping a rock on them or drowning them in water.

Blue "ore" gives you some nourishment, red one costs more to cross.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to skip turn
  • Hold Shift while moving to retreat (remove the current root tile)

Created by pali6, Woprock and Ermith in 48 hours as part of the Global Game Jam 2023.
